channel.title: My Framework
channel.description:
Derped with design, no longer working on this. Will update thread again with a better designed server.
[s]Working on making a server in my free time. I'm planning on adding support for 550 protocol alongside the current 317 support. I've had some bad luck with programming so far (I'm not really good at it :rolleyes:) so progress is going to be very slow.
I have added login for 317 and half ass packet processing (it's incomplete). Was never familiar with anything past getting the client to connect (mainly because I didn't see a point in doing it).
If anybody wants to contribute to it, please feel free too. I'm not expecting to make some [size=8pt]godlike[/size] server so don't expect anything good. I don't plan on hosting this (unless it does get somewhere lol).
Github: https://github.com/Ashi/RuneScape-Emulator
Pics: [IMG width=600 height=400]http://i57.tinypic.com/34xrx5h.png[/img] Sorry, got nothing to actually show, show-off with or whatever :D
I'll keep the thread updated now and again, I'd appreciate criticism. [/s]

It seemed pretty rubbish to me (from the pictures I saw anyway). I’ll take a look at it one day :p[/quote]It is, don’t worry. Stick with ubuntu.
